name: smartrecruiter
description: SmartRecruiter is an intelligent Applicant Tracking System (ATS) that combines AI, NLP, and Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to automate recruitment tasks, rank candidates, and assist recruiters in making fair and informed hiring decisions.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run frontend" "cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload"
scripts.backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn main:app --reload --port 8000
